intro: Put your general knowledge to the test in « Who wants to be a millionaire? », the official game!
description:
Test your general knowledge and reasoning skills in “Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?”, the official video game of the show!

Experience the suspense of the famous TV show in the official video game Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 
Climb the prize ladder by answering 15 increasingly difficult questions. Is that your final answer? 

THOUSANDS OF QUESTIONS

Over 6000 questions to test your general knowledge on more than 15 diverse topics: 

• Art & Literature
• Science
• Geography
• History
• Entertainment
• Star Wars
• Harry Potter
• Disney
• Superheroes
• Manga
• TV series
• Sports
• Soccer
• Language
• Lifestyle
• World food

Music, lifelines, phone a friend, 50/50, suspense... it’s all there! Relive the authentic atmosphere of the show! 

United Kingdom, United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, and France... these 6 countries each have exclusive questions available in players’ native languages.

Select your favorite topics and practice in personalized sessions to enhance your general knowledge and improve your chances of winning the jackpot! Unlock question packs by accumulating “Neurons” as you play.

FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY!

The game includes “EASY” mode so players of all ages can have fun.
There is also a “FAMILY MODE”  which tailors questions to each player based on age.
In “TAKING TURNS” mode, compete against up to 9 other players, sharing the controller. If you make a mistake, you’re eliminated, and the last one standing is the champion!

In “FREE-FOR-ALL” mode, it’s a race for points with up to 4 players. Building a streak of correct answers earns extra points and brings you closer to victory!

COMPETE WITH PLAYERS FROM AROUND THE WORLD IN ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MODE
In “ONLINE MULTIPLAYER” mode, you can play up to 50 players online!
In this Battle Royale, players can face up to 49 opponents with direct elimination: answer the questions correctly as quickly as possible to finish in first place and become the champion!

IS THAT REALLY YOUR FINAL ANSWER?
